name: spanntastic
text: Awwwwww puppy dogs!

name: howard
text: I want to play with that little psycho and learn his name!

name: hipjiverobot
text: That is the proper response upon seeing a dachshund.

name: gournal
text: Well you're half in luck because "the dog's name is Heaven Dog"

name: lolsworth
text: He means his real name. His secret name. The name that the dog gave himself, or that the other dogs gave him.

name: petitegitan
text: Look how sad the dog's eyes are!

name: zefiel
text: You can't rate yourself, but I shall assist you with your Lameppuku.

text: Nono, he tried giving it a plus one.

text: A comment left by saint was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by rowboat, theplaidknight, cailetshadow, thatcrazycommie)

name: macdaddyw
text: Because some people would be assholes, or bored at 1 in the morning and want to click buttons instead of sleeping

name: saint
text: A comment left by saint was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ted0phile, fosters, rowboat)

name: rowboat
text: A comment left by rowboat was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Semiquaver, hurfdurf, holly_golightly)

name: saint
text: A comment left by saint was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by fosters, robbingdog, motts)

name: semiquaver
text: For "lame Saint, hail Satan," I award you one bitter, partisan chubby.

name: tragicone
text: I only find you lame on the rarest of occasions saint.

name: semiquaver
text:
This is lame. You are lame. Saint, is, often lame, but this shadowing of yours...it is crushingly lame. I have responded to many interesting posts by Saint but nothing about you but your lameness has so far inspired me.

This is how Colbert rules on this. There will be no contradiction.

name: saint
text:
Colbert is America. I don't mind people having bitter feelings toward me. I encourage it. I just appreciate that there are people like you that see me for what I am.

An asshole with an agenda.

name: semiquaver
text: Dammit man now when I see you all I will see is Denis Leary holding a day-planner.

name: saint
text: For this I apologize.

name: atticusonline
text: I used to lame Asherdan all the time. I don't care what he says now, he's deserved more lames than I can give him.

name: soticoto
text:
Once again proving that things are truly twisted in your little world.
I used to lame Asherdan all the time too, but have since instead realised that it was unjust, for Asherdan's commentary is actually quite witty if regarded singularly. YOU on the other hand should have been granted a fair portion of the lames I erroneously granted to Asherdan... since you never post anything of any quality.

name: joeyramoney
text: lame this man!

name: direhaggis
text: Non-production has been sensed by this dog.

name: thisdoggisproice
text: "My dog looked at me with her eyes."

name: littlefatdog
text: the dog is cute.

name: rowboat
text: She is a cookie pregnant moron.

name: anonymous44
text: I never sausage a dog

name: mr_lostman28
text: ohohohohoho.... belly laugh

name: hypoluxa
text:
petitegitan wrote:
"Look how sad the dog's eyes are!"


That's because he is hurt by the crushing silence of non-production.

name: dropkickpikachu
text: Boy that ain't how you quote fellers.

name: tragicone
text: it is a system that does not even support the idea of quotes.

name: tekende
text:
Quote:
it is a system that does not even support the idea of quotes.


Oh, is it now?

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
shhhh....

it might not have back then..

name: tragicone
text:
No, i cannot deny tekende his right to be right.

It had the ability back then.
But close to no one knows how to do it i would surmise.

name: soticoto
text: A comment left by soticoto was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by saddestking, goatmasterflash, NeoNaoNeo, Mangtastic, BionicVapourBoy, eatmorekix, mashisoyo, fosters, varnish, Thirteen20WRX, atticusonline, Art-Vader, Direhaggis, Doc_Rostov, stormagnet)

name: aelindil
text: ...This is one of the more disturbing things I've heard in the recent past.

name: soticoto
text: A comment left by soticoto was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by NeoNaoNeo, varnish, Thirteen20WRX, atticusonline, Art-Vader, logic)

name: direhaggis
text: Our own autistic superhero asshole.

name: soticoto
text: You folks keep laming me like this and I might not continue doing you the favour of making you look better by comparison.

name: hellofditties
text: You know what else?  Dogs can't say or mean sorry.

name: hellofditties
text: Oh yeah.  They can't use straws.  No lips, just 'mouth edges.'

name: rowboat
text: The name of the dog...the dog is called Heaven.

name: redmange
text:
I use to have a Dachshund that looked just like that. Then he died. Seeing this dog was named Heaven Dog made me cry.

I still love you Onstad.

name: woodenteeth
text: Did he die of intenstinal related disorders? These dogs die of these things often I hear. Mainly because humans desire to produce genetic weirdness can have fucked up consequences.

name: aelindil
text:
Dachshunds are more likely to die from spinal problems, also consequences of genetic weirdness. Also, they cannot be deterred from using stairs, despite the obvious dangers involved.

And there's your lesson on canine genetic disorders for the day!

name: woodenteeth
text: Oh maaaan, I just totally had a mental image of a Dachshund Slinky falling down the stairs...

name: aelindil
text:
all yipping as it hits each step
fat rolls sliding back and forth between head and tail
making that "shhhhlrrrp shhhhhlrrrp" noise slinkies make

On an unrelated note, if that is you in your avatar, you look IDENTICAL to a dude I used to know...Y'know, biblically.

name: aelindil
text:
That meant to be a lot less creepy than I am certain it sounded.

My apologies.

name: woodenteeth
text: Worry not, I followed it with something a little creepier. Yay! Let's be facebook friends... FOREVER!

name: woodenteeth
text: Well, you're into Porcupine Tree, so quite frankly, if I only resemble someone you've known biblically, you certainly have a high chance in the future.

name: aelindil
text:
THEY ARE COMING TO SEATTLE IN SEPTEMBER AND I AM GOING TO SEE THEM AND THERE ARE NO WORDS FOR HOW AWESOME THAT IS

I mean, yeah man, they're pretty cool. *cough*

Okay also you are the same age as that other dude, so I don't know what the fuck kind of trick the universe is playing on me.

name: woodenteeth
text:
Damn it. I'm a trick. Played by the universe. Well, I suppose I've fufiled my Karmic duties. What to do... what to do.

Do you think Shiva will come and pick me up? Will she drive to Australia?

name: aelindil
text:
If you're anything to judge by, everything has an Australian doppelganger, including Shiva.

What kind of car would The Destroyer drive, anyway? Some sort of gas-guzzling, fume-belching monstrosity?

name: woodenteeth
text:
The pick-up of choice in Hawaii. I went there once and the rusting hulks of these over-sized monstars can resemble a rotting elephant carcass.

Maybe she drives a modified rotting elephant carcass... appropriate, no?

name: woodenteeth
text:
Oh and one last thing before we stink up this comment section with our own personal conversations too much: Oceansize are the best band along those same lines. Please buy all their albums immediately.

Hit me up on myspace for further discussion.

name: aelindil
text: Oh heavens how you make me wish I could bring myself to creating a myspace.

name: woodenteeth
text: Search for my first and last name on facebook. The myspace site should give it away.

name: tekende
text: Hey everybody, aelindil and woodenteeth are gonna have sex!

name: woodenteeth
text:
We are both The Asexual Drones of Progressive Rock.

Also thousands and thousands of kilometres apart , and kinda married... and fuck you tekende just... go call bixmix.

ABLOO BLOO BLOO!

name: aelindil
text:
Yeah, the difference between Sydney and Tacoma is a rather substantial one.

And I do not think someone who has posted pictures of a meeting between himself and another assetbarrian has Much Room to Talk.

name: tekende
text: Hey, fuck you, man. I was joking and you just went to a pretty dark place.

name: aelindil
text: It is a dangerous thing to step into the wishful thinking of those who dwell in these here internets.

name: woodenteeth
text: That was a dark place? How on earth was I supposed to know?

name: tekende
text:
Sorry, man. It's okay. I overreacted, and yeah, I guess there's no way you would know.

Incidentally, who the fuck chubbied my "fuck you" post. Odd choice.

name: aelindil
text: Hurr, it was me.  I can't recall my logic at the time, but there might not actually have been any at all, since I was incredibly stoned on cold medication.  Either way, HUUUUUUGS!

name: tekende
text: Perhaps you thought "a chubby will make this man feel better"

name: aelindil
text: ...did you?

name: tekende
text: Maybe.

name: fineoakstructure
text: Hey everybody, aelindil and tekende are gonna have sex!

name: tekende
text: Oh, sweet!

name: aelindil
text: DISCLAIMER: NEITHER OF THESE MEN GOT ANY KIND OF SEXING FROM ME

name: woodenteeth
text: CONFIRMER: YEAH. I GOT NUTHIN.

name: tekende
text: she's lying, it was awesome

name: fineoakstructure
text: did you guys french?

name: aelindil
text:
French was my major in college. I took 8 years of it.

And no.

name: aelindil
text:
YET.

[this is not to be taken seriously]

name: tekende
text: Are you kidding we frenched for like eight minutes or so

name: fineoakstructure
text:
oh man insane. my tongue gets tired after like three.

i start fingering like crazy normally after four.

oh DAMMIT i broke it all again oh well someone had to do it (i think you kids call this a combo breaker?)

name: woodenteeth
text: I prefer to not picture someone "fingering like crazy". Although I do remember the puzzled and somewhat frightened looks of girls in high school (who would always confide in me but never let me get my crazy finger on).

name: redmange
text: Man don't hate the finger, hate the game.

name: fineoakstructure
text: Let's pour a little out for all those crazy fingerings that could've been...

name: rowboat
text: Hey everybody, I'm gonna have sex with all of you in a second!

name: atticusonline
text: Nonsense!

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
this figure's description earns the five i give.

Because of their long ears, dogs can sense and be hurt by the crushing silence of non-production.

awesome.

name: carlyle
text: Heaven Dog is a name I should name something of mine.

name: thaes
text: In addition to sensing the crushing silence of non-production, those long ears are also perfect for having secret, private dachshund ideas whispered into them.
